pageContent: Background: The 2015 Coffey-Holden Prostate Cancer Academy Meeting, themed: "Multidisciplinary Intervention of Early, Lethal Metastatic Prostate Cancer," was held in La Jolla, California from June 25 to 28, 2015.

metaData.source:
Dissociation of sexual function and sexual bother following autologous sural nerve grafting during radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17593095/
